welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fujisawa, where traditional Japanese culture meets modern city life. Enjoy our beautiful beaches, historic temples, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that Fujisawa has to offer!

restaurants.name: Curry Club キュイエール
restaurants.description: Curry Club キュイエール is a japanese curry restaurant located in 鎌倉市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal of Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network by registering with a valid email address.
